title: Portfolio SPA (Vanilla JavaScript)
description: A single-page portfolio built with hash-based routing, dynamic rendering, responsive layout, and a validated contact form. Focused on clean structure and reusable UI components.

title: Task Manager with LocalStorage
description: A task management web app that supports creating, filtering, and persisting tasks using localStorage. Designed with a clean UI and mobile-first layout.

title: Responsive E-Commerce UI (Product Listing)
description: A responsive product listing interface with reusable product cards, category tags, and layout optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop screens.

title: Weather Dashboard (API Integration)
description: A lightweight dashboard that fetches real-time weather data from a public API and displays it with a clean, readable UI. Includes error handling and loading states.

title: Modern Landing Page Template
description: A modern landing page template with strong typography, consistent spacing, and responsive sections. Built to be easily customizable for startups or personal brands.

title: UI Components Playground
description: A small collection of reusable UI components (buttons, cards, tags, forms) focused on consistency and accessibility. Built as practice for building scalable UI systems.

title: Notes App (CRUD + Search)
description: A simple notes application allowing users to create, edit, delete, and search notes on the client side. Designed with usability and clarity in mind.

title: Form Validation & UX Patterns Demo
description: A demo project focused on building robust form validation, user feedback messages, and accessible input patterns without any backend.
